ayahs.wordByWord: وَٱلشَّمْسِ [By the sun] وَضُحَىٰهَا [and its brightness]
وَٱلْقَمَرِ [And the moon] إِذَا [when] تَلَىٰهَا [it follows it]
وَٱلنَّهَارِ [And the day] إِذَا [when] جَلَّىٰهَا [it displays it]
وَٱلَّيْلِ [And the night] إِذَا [when] يَغْشَىٰهَا [it covers it]
وَٱلسَّمَآءِ [And the heaven] وَمَا [and (He) Who] بَنَىٰهَا [constructed it]
وَٱلْأَرْضِ [And the earth] وَمَا [and by (He) Who] طَحَىٰهَا [spread it]
وَنَفْسٍۢ [And (the) soul] وَمَا [and (He) Who] سَوَّىٰهَا [proportioned it]
فَأَلْهَمَهَا [And He inspired it] فُجُورَهَا [(to distinguish) its wickedness] وَتَقْوَىٰهَا [and its righteousness]
قَدْ [Indeed] أَفْلَحَ [he succeeds] مَن [who] زَكَّىٰهَا [purifies it]
وَقَدْ [And indeed] خَابَ [he fails] مَن [who] دَسَّىٰهَا [buries it]
كَذَّبَتْ [Denied] ثَمُودُ [Thamud] بِطَغْوَىٰهَآ [by their transgression]
إِذِ [When] ٱنۢبَعَثَ [(was) sent forth] أَشْقَىٰهَا [(the) most wicked of them]

ayahs.textUthmani: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقْيَـٰهَا
ayahs.wordByWord: فَقَالَ [But said] لَهُمْ [to them] رَسُولُ [(the) Messenger] ٱللَّهِ [(of) Allah] نَاقَةَ [(It is the) she-camel] ٱللَّهِ [(of) Allah] وَسُقْيَـٰهَا [and her drink]
ayahs.transliteration: Faqala lahum rasoolu Allahi naqataAllahi wasuqyaha

ayahs.textUthmani: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمْ فَسَوَّىٰهَا
ayahs.wordByWord: فَكَذَّبُوهُ [But they denied him] فَعَقَرُوهَا [and they hamstrung her] فَدَمْدَمَ [So destroyed] عَلَيْهِمْ [them] رَبُّهُم [their Lord] بِذَنۢبِهِمْ [for their sin] فَسَوَّىٰهَا [and leveled them]
ayahs.transliteration: Fakaththaboohu faAAaqaroohafadamdama AAalayhim rabbuhum bithanbihim fasawwaha

ayahs.wordByWord: وَلَا [And not] يَخَافُ [He fears] عُقْبَـٰهَا [its consequences]
وَٱلَّيْلِ [By the night] إِذَا [when] يَغْشَىٰ [it covers]
وَٱلنَّهَارِ [And the day] إِذَا [when] تَجَلَّىٰ [it shines in brightness]
وَمَا [And He Who] خَلَقَ [created] ٱلذَّكَرَ [the male] وَٱلْأُنثَىٰٓ [and the female]
إِنَّ [Indeed] سَعْيَكُمْ [your efforts] لَشَتَّىٰ [(are) surely diverse]
فَأَمَّا [Then as for] مَنْ [(him) who] أَعْطَىٰ [gives] وَٱتَّقَىٰ [and fears]
وَصَدَّقَ [And believes] بِٱلْحُسْنَىٰ [in the best]
فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ [Then We will ease him] لِلْيُسْرَىٰ [towards [the] ease]
وَأَمَّا [But as for] مَنۢ [(him) who] بَخِلَ [withholds] وَٱسْتَغْنَىٰ [and considers himself free from need]

words.translation: and considers himself free from need

ayahs.wordByWord: وَكَذَّبَ [And denies] بِٱلْحُسْنَىٰ [the best]
فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ [Then We will ease him] لِلْعُسْرَىٰ [towards [the] difficulty]

ayahs.textUthmani: وَمَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَمَا [And not] يُغْنِى [will avail] عَنْهُ [him] مَالُهُۥٓ [his wealth] إِذَا [when] تَرَدَّىٰٓ [he falls]
إِنَّ [Indeed] عَلَيْنَا [upon Us] لَلْهُدَىٰ [(is) the guidance]
وَإِنَّ [And indeed] لَنَا [for Us] لَلْـَٔاخِرَةَ [(is) the Hereafter] وَٱلْأُولَىٰ [and the first (life)]
فَأَنذَرْتُكُمْ [So I warn you] نَارًۭا [(of) a Fire] تَلَظَّىٰ [blazing]
